title: Change user name
body: Is is possible to change username? my account have been hack once, and i was force to change password and the hacker is still trying to hack it because of the username.

replies.body: It's not possible to change usernames.  You can change your email and password through, with steps available in our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide.  I specifically suggest going over our[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your information is safe inside and outside of league.  Let me know if that clears things up!
